result.title: A blog post for people who want to connect their account with oj.uz
result.content:
This is for people who want to add their account to oj.uz. Previously, we used the Talks feature, but nowadays we are not able to sign in to Codeforces automatically (it seems Javascript is needed..), so we decided to use this trick instead.

As instructed, please copy your authentication key from the settings page and paste in comments with your account.

UPD: it seems you may get downvotes :0 We are sorry for that, to avoid this remember that it is possible to remove your comment in 2 minutes after you posted.
